name: Unauthorized Process Execution
description: This policy generates a violation for any process execution that is not explicitly allowed by a locked process whitelist for a given container specification within a Kubernetes deployment.
rationale: A locked process whitelist communicates high confidence that execution of a non-whitelisted process positively indicates malicious activity.
remediation: Evaluate this process execution for malicious intent, examine other accessible resources for abnormal activity, then kill the pod in which this process executed.
